shortDescription:
Kit Includes:
GoPro MAX 360 Action Camera,
SanDisk Ultra 32GB microSDHC UHS-I card with Adapter,
ULTIMAXX GoPro Head Strap,
ULTIMAXX GOPRO HAND MONOPOD SELFIE,
ULTIMAXX GoPro Wrist Strap,
ULTIMAXX GOPRO FLOATY BOBBER,
High Speed SD/SDHC/Micro SD Reader/Writer,
ULTIMAXX GoPro Chest Strap
ULTIMAXX Helmet Front Mount Kit for GoPro,
ULTIMAXX 2 Pack Black Buckle Basic Mount, for GoPro Hero,
ULTIMAXX Vertical Surface J-Hook Buckle 1pk for GoPro Hero,
ULTIMAXX Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

Take panoramic photos and videos without actually panning your camera GoPro MAX 360 Action Camera. Using opposite side lenses, the MAX can capture everything that happens in a 360° view in up to 4992 x 2496 resolution video and 5760 x 2880 still photos. Both photos and video are automatically stitched in the camera for editing flexibility and easy sharing. It can also use only one lens to capture traditional GoPro HERO-style wide-angle action footage when needed. The MAX supports multiple modes for creative video and photos, which can take 270° still photos without distortion. TimeWarp mode allows you to record in standard HERO mode with a variable speed function; you can slow down then speed up your footage in real time with one tap. The MAX supports the HEVC video format which records very small files while preserving image quality, saving you precious space on your SD card. There are four lens sizes to choose from for just the right angle: Narrow, Linear, Wide, and Max SuperView for those extremely wide shots. To complement the camera's spherical video, spherical audio is also recorded. Using six microphones, you can record sounds from all directions, creating a totally immersive 360° surround-sound video playback experience.

groups.shortDescription:

Protect it today. Enjoy it for years.

Simply add a Walmart Protection Plan to your order and checkout as usual. There is no need to register your plan for it to be active. We?ll send plan details to your email address after purchase.

Award-winning protection backed by Allstate

Allstate has been protecting people and the things they love most for over 85 years. So you know your purchase is in good hands.

services.name: Premium Tech Support & Security
services.selectedDisplayName: Expert Help - Premium Tech Support & Security

groups.shortDescription:
For less than the price of a weekly coffee, you can receive one year of Premium Tech Support & Security powered by True Network Solutions. Our US-based tech experts are available 24/7 by phone, chat, or email to assist you when you need it!


For only $99, this $400 value includes unlimited support for all the tech you own — computers, smart home products, printers, routers, tablets, and more.


What's included with this 1-year service?

  • McAfee Total Protection to defend against viruses & online threats
  • Unlimited 24/7 1-on-1 tech coaching and tech support with live multi-lingual US-based Tech Experts
  • Unlimited virus removal for up to 10 devices
  • Initial Setup service and ongoing support for any of your tech products, no matter where you bought them
  • Access to 1 Data Recovery service: if your computer suffers a data loss, we can recover it free of charge*
  • Unlimited troubleshooting, software support, and PC tune-ups


Questions? Call (316) 776-4357 to learn more from our friendly tech team.



How do I receive service?

Simply add this service to your cart and check out. Once purchased, you'll receive an email from True Network with the information needed to initiate service at your convenience. You'll be able to call, email, or chat 24/7/365 with a US-based tech expert


How long do I receive service for?

This is a one-year service plan and does not auto-renew.


True Satisfaction

True Network Solutions is committed to making sure every customer is happy with our services! We'll do everything possible to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied. If you would like to provide feedback on your experience or encounter any issues, we're ready to listen. Contact our Customer Service team 24/7 at (316) 776-4357.


* We use commercially reasonable efforts to attempt to recover your lost data and files using both basic and advanced methods. Methods include but are not limited to current software and hardware techniques available as well as proprietary techniques developed for data recovery.
